Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the Spurs to win based on their recent performance.
Coach Steve Kerr emphasized the importance of strong perimeter defense.
The duel between Devin Wembanyama and Lauri Markkanen was highlighted as the key matchup.
Post-Match Reflections: Lauri Markkanen is very uncertain due to an injury in the lower back.
Jordan Clarkson could take over for Lauri Markkanen.
